transcription.text:
Speaker 1: Hey Mark, I made it pretty quick, but so I did exactly what you wanted.

Speaker 2: I put a stop to any and all monthly shipments, then I overrode the system and I sent an email

Speaker 1: on your behalf and our behalf to put a stop to any and all monthly refills to Dr. Scott

Speaker 2: Sanderson.

Speaker 1: And I also put a stop to any and all monthly charges and I paused your prescription and

Speaker 2: I set it up for you, bud.

Speaker 2: future, log in with your charter.net, go to a category that says your prescription, okay?

Speaker 2: Like within a three to four hour period?

Speaker 1: I don't, I haven't needed it so I don't use it and it keeps coming each month and I'm

Speaker 2: spending this money for nothing.

Speaker 1: Yeah, I completely understand.

Speaker 2: So just hold on to what you have.

Speaker 1: If you ever need anything stronger or less potent, call me.

Speaker 2: I can send replacers within 30 days.

Speaker 1: But use that red button and my extension is 0037 and my name is KT Goodrich.

Speaker 2: Call me for anything you need but when you go to your prescription, there's that red

Speaker 1: button.

Speaker 2: Even when you're traveling, you forget your batches or your prescription, click that button,

Speaker 1: just update your shipping address and we'll send it to your hotel room, right bud?

Speaker 2: Just let me know how I can be of help, bud.

Speaker 1: I'm not getting any more charges or subscription, right?

Speaker 2: There is no subscription.

Speaker 1: What it was was Dr. Scott Sanderson.

Speaker 1: a stop to any monthly shipments and I put a stop to any monthly charges and I pause

Speaker 2: your prescription and I put you in total control.

Speaker 1: The only caveat to this, Mark, is when you click that button, we're not allowed legally

Speaker 2: in your state to send you more than one refill per month, right?

Speaker 1: That's illegally, right?

Speaker 2: So as long as you click it whenever you want, you're good to go.

Speaker 2: next year but if you don't want any at all, I'm going to have to delete and cancel the

Speaker 1: Do that.
